name: Death Delivery
description:
Death Deliver is a small game made for the Game Dev.tv game jam 2022 in only 2 days. In this action packed game, you play as a young Grimm reaper that works at a postal company. Due to the underworld’s new protocol “Death is only the beginning” you need to deliver a care package for the new soul! Use your trusty box to platform your way to the house where you will deliver your package!

Source Files
